themes: frustration with vocal critics influencing funding decisions
need for program stability and continuity
key_phrases: don't pull the rug out from under us
we have only had a couple years under the pilots
The pilots were good, and can be tweaked
don't throw the baby out with the bathwater
a few squeaky wheels are feeling entitled about funding they used to receive
barriers_identified: instability due to sudden program changes
influence of vocal critics on funding decisions
solutions_proposed: tweak pilot programs rather than eliminate them
maintain continuity instead of reverting to previous funding structures
